home.tellus: Tell us about your business and services
about.title: About us
about.introduction:
JPVN Group is a multidisciplinary economic group with a diverse ecosystem of member companies covering many different fields: tourism, events, technology, investment consultant, real estate, chemical substances, cosmetics, trade promotion.
We are an organizational unit of the Tokyo, Japan Trade Association and have close relations with Japanese corporations in developing business between Vietnam and Japan.
about.vision: Our vision is to become an international multidisciplinary and prestigious economic group.
about.mission: Our mission is to promote international cooperation, comply fully with the law and be source of profit for investors.
about.integrityContent: We always place utmost importance on customers, we ensure to fulfill our commitments to customers and partners with all of our enthusiasm.
about.wisdomContent: We believe that “Wisdom is an invaluable asset”, we uphold the spirit of “Dare to think, dare to do” to develop the business.
about.credibilityContent: We consider building Credibility as our guiding principle, we always ensure true commitment to customers and partners and vigorously protect Credibility as protecting our honor.
